To develop a 12-storey mixed-use development, with 258 Affordable Housing Units and 2 Commercial units on the ground floor. Includes 84 parking spaces (4 accessible, 1 loading space) and 129 Bike Parking Spaces. Amenity space is provided on the roof.

To construct a new 12 storey hotel on the western portion of the subject lands. Contains 220 hotel rooms, 436 m2 of ground floor commercial and 628 m2 of indoor amenity area. Includes 155 surface parking spaces.
To remove Part Lot Control for the development of 38 Townhouse units
To develop 41 two-storey townhouse units.
To develop 79 residential dwelling units contained in 21 townhouse units and 58 back-to-back townhouse units.
To add a 100 m2 addition to the existing structure (animal hospital) for a combined total floor area of 272 m2
Creation of 2 lots to facilitate phased development
To construct a 2 storey, 342 m2 addition to be added to the existing 1 storey building.

To facilitate the development of 74 townhouse units and 42 back-to-back townhouse units for a total of 116 units, each unit will have two parking spaces and an additional 58 visitor parking spaces are proposed.
To develop a 3 to 5 storey warehouse with a total floor area of 14,746 m², consisting of a self-storage facility, interior loading, retail and reception use, and ground floor commercial uses.
Removal of holding provision is part of site plan approval.
Residential development consisting of 10-storeys, 2.5 levels below grade parking and 91 units.

To create 2 blocks. Block 1 will consist of 74 townhouse units, 42 back-to-back townhouses, amenity area, sidewalks, private road network, and visitor parking. Block 2 is required for the future Carmel Dr extension.
Lapsed Site Plan Extension - Proposal to construct a four pump gas station with canopy at (182 sq m) & a 1-storey convenience store at (185 sq m) with 8 parking spaces.
Lapsed Site Plan Renewal SPA-19-108 - To construct a 52.49 m2 enclosed covered patio restaurant addition with a total capacity of 39 seats to the existing restaurant.
To demolish the existing single family dwelling and construct a new single family dwelling with a garage.
To demolish the existing single detached dwelling in order to construct a new two storey single detached dwelling
To construct a nine (9) storey tower atop a four (4) storey base for a total of 13 storeys (43m). The proposal will provide for 122 residential units with 138m2 of commercial space at grade.

To extend Melange Dr. and Silver Maple Dr. to connect to Garner Rd E for the development of 25 single detached dwellings and 2 multiple dwelling blocks for 71 up to 91 dwelling units. Existing heritage house to be retained.

To develop a 10 storey multiple dwelling with 270 units and 59 townhouse dwellings, of which, 9 will be on a proposed street 'A'. The multiple dwelling is proposed with 238 parking spaces and the townhouses are proposed with 141 spaces.

Construction of a new five (5) storey mixed use building on the southern portion of the Site. The proposed building will contain approximately 87 multiple dwelling units in tandem with ±1,193m² of commercial gross floor area.

To allow an increase to the loading dock capacity by adding twenty new loading docks, twenty additional loading spaces, and a reconfiguration of the parking area for the existing Canada Post facility.

To rezone to permit a mixed-use development comprised of two 15-storey towers and two 27-storey towers above a 3 to 7-storey base building (82m max height).  Includes a total of 762 dwelling units, 1,003 m2 of commercial space and 369 parking spaces.

To construct a mixed use development consisting of six towers ranging in height from 9 to 20 storeys and containing a total of 1,150 multiple dwelling units and 1,359 square metres of retail floor area, along with 844 parking spaces.

To change the zoning to permit a 12 storey residential building with 104 residential units. Driveway accesses via Ferguson Ave S and Liberty St for the proposed parking spaces (46 spaces underground and 4 spaces at grade).

To construct a 4-unit, 19,314 sq. m. industrial building (warehousing) including 1,301.20 sq. m. of accessory office space.  Includes 45 truck trailer parking spaces along the southerly side lot line and 165 parking spaces
To renovate the existing single detached dwelling and add an addition.
To construct an 11-storey mixed-use building, having a maximum height of 34.6 m containing 136 residential units with 665 sq. m. of commercial uses on the ground floor.
To build a triplex with two units on the first level and one unit on the upper level with three parking spaces.
To change zoning to the Residential “R3” Zone to permit the lands to be developed for a single detached dwelling.
Application lapsed
To develop a single building intended for warehousing.
To develop an 8-storey non-combustible building consisting of 130 units and one level of underground parking.
To develop a 5 unit, 4 storey block of town homes with rear access to garages for each unit.
